SEARCH
Module se1.bestellsystem
Package datamodel

Class Customer

Object
Customer
public final class Customer extends Object
Immutable entity class representing a Customer, a person who creates and holds (owns) orders in the system.
An immutable class does not allow changes to attributes. DataFactory is the only class that creates Customer objects from validated arguments.
Version:
"D12-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
Author:
"sgraupner"

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      protected Customer(long id, String firstName, String lastName)
      None-public constructor used by DataFactory preventing object creation outside this package.
      Parameters:
      id - customer identifier supplied by DataFactory
      firstName - first name attribute, must not be null, can be empty ""
      lastName - last name attribute, must not be null and not empty "".
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is negative, firstName is null or lastName is null or empty ""

      public Customer addContact(String contact)
      Add new contact validated through DataFactory. Method has no effect if contact is not valid.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • deleteContact

      public void deleteContact(int i)
      Delete the i-th contact with i >= 0 and i < contactsCount(). Method has no effect for i outside valid bounds.
      Parameters:
      i - index of contact to delete

      public void deleteAllContacts()
